data.title: SHAZAM, www.michaelgraytv.com, Home Page
data.meta_description: For SHAZAM fans who want to know what happened to 70's Star Michael Gray & want to buy autographed photos.
data.text:
Signed to a management deal with Charles Laufer,

pubisher of "Tiger Beat," Michael was able to keep a

high profile while rounding up other acting roles.

Michael's second series came in 1974,

when he was cast in his signature role,

as Billy Batson on the Saturday

morning series Shazam.

The series ran for 3 years but, was then cancelled

due to increasing production costs.

Today, Michael has added to his TV credits having

been on FXX's hit show "Archer"

and

AMC's "Comic Book Men"

He's currently getting ready to go on the

"Comic Con Circuit" after just doing

"Monterey Comic Con"

If you would like to see Michael at your local Comic Con,

just go to your cities comic con website and

request him in the "Contact Us" section.
